Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record). The patient by be represented by a third party such as a carer or family member.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CDA Encounter type subset with original subset original id 1341000000130.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
